Sentencas: Steam reforming of diesel is performed over Ru/gamma-Al2O3 and Ni/gamma-Al2O3 catalysts.
Titulo: Enhanced stability of co-reforming diesel and methanol into hydrogen-enriched gases for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The catalysts both achieve 100% diesel conversion rate and high hydrogen selectivity at temperatures over 600 degrees C but Ni/gamma-Al2O3 catalyst shows a poor carbon tolerance, carbon deposition has been detected after 10 h of test which is determined as encapsulating carbon.
Titulo: Enhanced stability of co-reforming diesel and methanol into hydrogen-enriched gases for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Co-reforming diesel and methanol is conducted by adding methanol into the steam-diesel mixture as a stabilizer and it successfully extends the long-term life from 120 h to 600 h at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Enhanced stability of co-reforming diesel and methanol into hydrogen-enriched gases for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The reformed diesel gas (RDG) is then fed into a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) to investigate fuel adaptability.
Titulo: Enhanced stability of co-reforming diesel and methanol into hydrogen-enriched gases for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The cell has achieved a peak power density of 1.34 W/cm2 at 750 degrees C under RDG fuel, and the cell voltage has stabilized at 0.82 V for 200 h during the galvanostatic discharge of 0.4 A/cm2.
Titulo: Enhanced stability of co-reforming diesel and methanol into hydrogen-enriched gases for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: No detectable carbon deposition has occurred on the surface of the Ni-YSZ anode.
Titulo: Enhanced stability of co-reforming diesel and methanol into hydrogen-enriched gases for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that the reformed diesel gas provides a good fuel choice for solid oxide fuel cell application.
Titulo: Enhanced stability of co-reforming diesel and methanol into hydrogen-enriched gases for solid oxide fuel cell application
